typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesCSV
moviesCSV derive(movies = @(movieid=movie,
		title=title,
		genres=split(genres,'|'),
		year=year,
		rating=Rating)) ~> MakeHierarchy
MakeHierarchy aggregate(groupBy(titlegrp = title),
	title = first(title)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1, Select1 join(Aggregate1@title == Select1@title,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
MakeHierarchy select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato},
		movies
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select2 keyGenerate(output(skey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		titlegrp,
		title = Aggregate1@title,
		movie,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato},
		movies
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/movies/title'],
	throughput: 2000,
	mapColumn(
		id = skey,
		movies
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> makeJSON
